      • isValidEmail

        public static boolean isValidEmail(java.lang.String email)
        Method that is a validation check for email of person. This method makes sure that the person email is a String containing only one '@' character and at least one '.' character. It also checks to make sure the '.' character follows the '@' character.
        Parameters:
        email - - string email parameter to validate
        Returns:
        valid - boolean variable. If false, email is invalid. If true, email is valid.
